summary: Completed comprehensive testing of milk shelf life predictor app. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend core functionality works well with minor dropdown selection precision issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options not selectable via data-value attribute, requires keyboard navigation

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warning in console

passed_tests: All 8 backend API endpoints (GET /api/, GET /api/product-types, POST /api/products, GET /api/products, GET /api/products/{id}, DELETE /api/products/{id}, POST /api/simulate-sensor/{id}, GET /api/sensor-data/{id}, GET /api/alerts)
Product CRUD operations for all 5 product types (milk, cheese, yogurt, butter, cream)
Shelf life calculation and status updates
Dashboard loading and stats cards display
Product cards with status badges, progress bars, and sensor readings
Navigation to product detail page and back
Product detail page with complete information and sensor history
Temperature and humidity sensor readings display
Shelf life percentage calculation and progress bar
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix product type dropdown selection - options should be selectable via click on data-value attributes, not just keyboard navigation. Also consider adding aria-describedby to DialogContent component to resolve accessibility warning.
